pr_title: Support running pinot batch ingestion standalone job in a parallel mode

timeline.message: Support running pinot batch ingestion standalone job in a parallel mode

timeline.bodyText: Nit: It might be confusing for user on why num threads may not match the specified jobParallelism (if numCores is smaller). Perhaps modify the log indicate that.
